name: End of the Ents
description:
End of the Ents is a game jam entry, more specifically for The Krass-N.G. Jam! . Part of the development of this game was streamed live on Twitch. The total development time as on this current time of writing was little over 22 hours. 

The topic of the jam was chosen at randomly, meaning every entry has a different mission. The instructions to create End of the Ents was : 

"A game where you banish ents while being torn between the forces of good and evil."

After consideration, I decided to slightly modify that line, swapping around the goodies and the baddies. Indeed... In End of the Ents, you are the leader of nature's finest spirits in the shape of various trees and you take on the evil that aims to destroy your environment...

Enjoy !
